where N 2 was used as the carrier gas.If there was any reactive residual carbon in the prepared samples, this would react with protons (H ) or H 2 generated from competitive water splitting and form CH 4 .However, neither CH 4 nor any other carbon compounds were detected, indicating that there was no residual carbon or other carbon contamination in our samples.This is in good agreement with other previously reported results. 49 In order to provide evidence for the photocatalytic reduction mechanism of CO 2
